character.CU: a purple shooting star takes the place of the pattern on the back of her dress

1.TX:
A smell of apples hangs around Sælora like a cloak.
Those with sensitive noses may note that apples is all that she smells off.

3.TX: Sælora has an enchanted scythe upon her back. Even those with skill at identifying enchantments may have trouble recognising the magic upon it.

5.TX: A magical aura hangs around Sælora, identifying her easily as a mage, while also obscuring other forms of magic upon her and her equipment.
